TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, they are the size of protons.

i wish for all the world to switch all exterior lights to blue hues.

020503222023

oo new page!

Edited March 22, 2023 by AlamoVampire

Granted. 

I wish for BERRYMAN-LANGFORD MEMETIC KILL AGENT

Granted. It becomes the latest flavor of Ben and Jerry's Ice Cream and becomes a popular success. You get one free tub for the idea, but shall never see a dime of the profits.

I wish for an airfoil.

Granted: You invent "Air Fencing", which is like "Air Guitar" but instead you duel with Air Foils.

I wish to learn and recall.

Granted. You get a total recall.

Spoiler


I wish to know all physical experiments of XIX century.

Edited March 28, 2023 by kerbiloid

Granted, but you die after a few seconds.


I wish I could time travel.

Granted. You go back in time so far that you loop back to the instant you left. No matter which way you go, your arrival is the instant you depart.

i wish i was a was that could be a was so hard it never was.

192404012023

(Ninja'd)Granted.  You become a "was" in a book on a sunken ship. 

I wish for a fully operational SCP-2000

Granted. GLaDOS will call you.

I wish for a cloudy day.

Granted, but it becomes a thunderstorm,  and you het struck by lightning.


I wish for a cookie.

Granted. You got some useless data. 

I wish for a second April Fool

Granted ot is on the 30th of April 

I wish for ship 24 and booster 7 to launch 

Is that to much to ask

Granted. But the booster crashed on the launchpad. Vanguard moment. 

I wish for an atmosphere-optimized NTR. 

Edited April 5, 2023 by Abel Military Services

Granted. On the one hand, atmospherically optimized NTR's expand humanities space-faring horizons. However, I hope you have a lead-lined rain coat and galoshes when going out into a radioactive rainstorm.

I wish a new computer.

Edited April 6, 2023 by Exploro

Granted, but as soon as you have spent 1 minute, it explodes.

 

I wish for KSP to be real.

Granted. You are a Kerbal. Now wish for your computer keeps being on.

I wish for lptputer. It's like a COM-puter, but LPT-puter.

Granted but a supersonic detonation occurs 

I wish for BDB to add modern mars missions s7ch as percyrover ect

Granted, but it becomes a full scale war, and enters the real world.




I wish my computer would stay on.

Granted it instantly explodes 

I wish for booster 9 to caught bybthe chopsticks

Granted. You pay 500 million to purchase the "chopsticks" from china. 

I wish for RSS/RO

Granted it is real slim shady and real overhead 

I wish for a unsuccessful OFT 

 

 

 

UNO reverse

Granted. But every other player gives you a +2 card. Now you have 10 cards! 

I wish for a reaper leviathan-proof Seamoth.

Granted it turn into leviathan seamoth 

I wish for the starship FAA licence

Granted. Now you may drive Enterprise.

I wish for a flashlight photon rocket.

Granted. It has crappy thrust and ridiculous efficiency. Unfortunately, it can only burn for 10 sec. 

I wish for a bigger seamoth.
